about_the_game:
An adult visual novel that immerses you in the vibrant life of a young man of 25 as he explores the complexities of love, life, and its mysteries.

Having just landed a job as a technician for a local newspaper, you move to a new city and soon discover an inexplicable attraction that women around you seem to feel. What is the source of this mysterious charm? How will you handle the intertwined relationships surrounding you and the impact they’ll have on your future?

JASON: Coming of Age was crafted to offer you maximum freedom while staying true to the core principles of a visual novel.

Every choice you make will shape the story. Dialogues and entire scenes will adapt to your decisions, with your actions potentially causing significant ripple effects and influencing character interactions.

Though Episode 1 follows a main storyline, it can be experienced in multiple ways, leaving the choice entirely up to you...

The personalities of certain characters—even the gender of some—can evolve depending on your choices, profoundly affecting the unfolding adventure and your relationships with them.

Key Features:

  • Freedom of Experimentation: Regardless of the preferences you set at the start of the game (such as sexual orientation, content types to avoid, or hidden fantasies), the game gives you the option to explore unconventional relationships at any moment if you wish.

  • Preference-Based Adaptation: The game tailors itself to your preferences, whether regarding sexuality or specific attractions, creating a personalized and immersive experience.

  • Customization of Love Interests: You can personalize the intimacy of the characters you interact with, fostering a deeper emotional and immersive connection. This customization can be accessed at any time through a dedicated menu, instantly reflecting throughout the game.

  • Character Compendium: Access a list of key story characters, each represented by customizable avatars. Choose from unlocked skins for their appearance, and enter a customization menu to personalize their intimacy levels. Every character includes a detailed description and a dynamic log of shared events, enriching your progression tracking throughout the game.

  • Dynamic Gallery: As your choices shape the story, a gallery of scenes and pivotal moments unlocks progressively. Accessible both during gameplay and from the main menu, it lets you revisit the game's best moments.

  • Interactive Exploration: Discover hidden areas that unlock exclusive scenes, and enjoy multiple camera angles, available via a button during gameplay, for varied experiences.

  • Immersive Messaging Interaction: Use the integrated phone interface to view messages from characters, respond in an immersive way, and influence your relationships. This feature adds a layer of realism and engagement.

  • Time Management: Each game scene is clearly time-stamped, offering an immersive timeline to follow event progression. The phone interface also updates as time passes.

  • Statistics: Check detailed statistics on your interactions with Love Interests at any time, helping you better understand the impact of your choices.

  • Multiple Routes and Informed Choices: If desired, you can try out different available routes before committing to one. No more endless saves or fear of missing out on unique content! The game lets you explore other paths, and you can confirm the one that best suits your adventure.

  • Replay Mode: Replay any scene as often as you want directly from the extras menu to relive the game’s key moments.
